title: LEGO Minecraft The Creeper Toy - Posable Mob Figure incl. a Hidden Compartment with a Pig & TNT Element - Building Set for 10+ Year Old Boys, Girls & Gaming Fans - 21276
features: The posable Creeper toy for kids – This large LEGO Creeper figure is a fun buildable toy for 10+ year old boys and girls who love Minecraft, whether for hands-on play or as gamer-room decor
Minecraft figure to build – This buildable LEGO Minecraft toy features four movable legs and a posable head that tilts up and down and moves side to side, bringing the iconic Creeper to life
Video game character collectible – This Minecraft Creeper building toy is ready for action, whether stalking through the Minecraft world or standing on display as a cool addition to a kid’s room
A hidden surprise – The front of this LEGO Minecraft mob figure’s head detaches to reveal a secret interior space with a first-version Creeper minifigure and a TNT element
Minecraft gift for kids – This LEGO build-and-play toy makes a great birthday, Christmas or anytime gift for 10+ year old boys and girls who love Minecraft
3D building instructions – Kids can use the LEGO Builder app for an interactive building experience with digital tools to zoom, rotate models in 3D, save building sets and track progress
Minecraft made real – LEGO Minecraft building toys give kids a different way to enjoy the game, bringing mobs, scenes and features to life with the hands-on creativity of LEGO bricks
description: From the manufacturer Minecraft gaming-room decor Large, posable Minecraft Creeper figure This build-play-and-display model of the iconic Minecraft Creeper stands over 21 cm (8 in.) tall and features movable legs, a posable head and a hidden surprise inside the head. Bring the Creeper to life! Jointed design for dynamic action Kids can move each of the 4 legs independently and adjust the model’s head position from side to side and over and down. A hidden treat Special elements inside the head The front of the LEGO Minecraft Creeper figure’s head detaches to reveal an interior space containing a mini, first-version Creeper and a TNT element for explosive fun. Rewarding building experience Empower kids with the joy of hands-on creativity The fun starts right away as kids immerse themselves in creative construction. For added digital fun, kids can also download the LEGO Builder app to zoom in, rotate models in 3D and track progress as they build. Expand kids’ Minecraft world More LEGO Minecraft sets to collect and combine Extend the creative fun even further by combining The Creeper with The TNT Jungle House (21275), The Pickaxe Mine (21277), The Pillager Outpost and Ravager (21278) and The Enderman Tower (21279), each sold separately. Previous page LEGO Minecraft The TNT Jungle House A 287-piece set (sold separately) featuring a buildable house designed like a large-scale version of the game’s iconic TNT element for kids aged 8 and over. LEGO Minecraft The Pickaxe Mine This 530-piece set (sold separately) features a mining mission filled with explosive action for kids aged 8 and over. LEGO Minecraft The Pillager Outpost and Ravager A 665-piece set (sold separately) featuring an axe-wielding Vindicator riding a jaw-snapping, head-ramming ravager for kids aged 8 and over. The Enderman Tower This 867-piece set (sold separately) lets kids aged 9 and over build and explore an Enderman tower with a portal or a fortress with adventures at every turn. Next page
